transcript: Hi, Sarah from Sales Corp. I noticed you've been using our analytics dashboard extensively. The custom reports you created look impressive! I understand you're looking to scale up the usage across your team. The enterprise plan would give you unlimited user seats and priority support. We can also provide custom training sessions for your team. The ROI analysis shows significant cost savings compared to your current setup. Would you like to move forward with the upgrade? Perfect! I'll prepare the contract right away.
